Articles.Content:
Yesterday, two kerbals (who's names remain classified at this time) landed on the surface of the planet Eve. According to sources, the kerbonauts secretly went to the purple world by the cover of night to plant a flag depicting a purple heart and the words "I Love You" in small cursive underneath. The location, in Eve's polar regions, has been declared the 'Mom Desert'. The plaque reads:

"I love you, mom. <3"

Apparently, this is in celebration of Mother's Day, specifically for the mother of the Director of the Jedi Space Program, who's favorite color is purple. The kerbonauts are both relatives of the Director, but he won't say in what capacity. The two will not be leaving Eve due to the gravity.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I love you, mom.
